Class JndiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.internal.util.jndi.JndiHelper
  • Deprecated. 
    As JNDI access should get routed through JndiService

public final class JndiHelper
extends Object
    Helper for dealing with JNDI.
